sourcesContent:
Create or Edit Quiz

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { QuizService } from 'src/app/QuizService/quiz.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-quiz', templateUrl: './create-quiz.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-quiz.component.css'] }) export class CreateQuizComponent { quiz: any = { title: '', questions: [], createdDate: new Date(), // Assuming handling on the frontend for simplicity creator: '', // This should be set based on the logged-in user or similar status: 'Draft', // Default status maxAttempts: 1, showAnswers: false, showScore: false, passMark: 0, scheduleDate: new Date(), // Set a default or use a date picker in the UI durationInSeconds: 0, randomizeQuestions: false }; constructor(private quizService: QuizService, private router: Router) {} addQuestion(): void { const newQuestion = { text: '', options: [], correctAnswerIndex: -1 }; // Default empty question this.quiz.questions.push(newQuestion); } saveQuiz(): void { // Update or create based on the quiz's presence in the database const operation = this.quiz.id ? this.quizService.updateQuiz(this.quiz.id, this.quiz) : this.quizService.createQuiz(this.quiz); operation.subscribe(response => { console.log('Quiz saved successfully', response); this.router.navigate(['/quiz-list']); }, error => { console.error('Error saving quiz', error); }); } }
